title: El Caballito de Mar
subtitle: The Seahorse
meta_desc: Learn seahorse vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, ocean animals Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: El Caballito de Mar
pages.prompt: A beautiful realistic seahorse floating among seaweed, delicate and colorful, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El caballito tiene cola curva.

pages.title: El caballito vive en el coral.
